Summary: Saw a light traveling south to north... It stopped for 15 minutes and moved again.....
divs: Sighting DetailsI was Standing outside talking my neighbor, I Saw a light traveling south to north... It stopped And I told my neighbor that the star we were looking at had just been moving and was not a star��� We stood talking for a while, and after about 15 minutes it started to move again��� It went in a fairly straight line from south to north west but zigzags slightly! at first it was moving fairly fast��� And then it slowed and began to fade, it looked like it was sitting still again but the just faded until we couldn't see it anymore.
